description: Ms. codex. Title from table of contents on fol. 1a. Physical description: 29 lines per page. Written in medium small naskh in black ink, with use of red for headings and re-inking. Light cream European paper; glossy. Fol. 1 is apparently a later replacement. Yellow thread page markers to indicate beginning of text. Title on tail of text block. Modern foliation in pencil using Western numerals (one fol. between fol. 36 and 37: blank) ; another modern foliation using Arabic numerals (this record follows the latter). Inscription in Arabic script on a handmade label pasted on the upper cover: "Rasāʼil 23 [in black ink] SH 150 [in red pencil, repeated on a label pasted on pastedown of the upper cover]. Origin: The copy is not dated.
author: Ibn Quṭlūbughā, al-Qāsim ibn ʻAbd Allāh, 1399 or 1400-1474 or 1475
abstract: Collection of several works by Ibn Quṭlūbughā, mainly short questions regarding ritual or purity matters.
contents: 1. fol. 1a: Fihrist mā fī hādhā al-majmūʻ min al-rasāʼil taʼlīf al-Shaykh Qāsim ibn Quṭlūbughā.
2. fol. 1b-16a: Rafʻ al-ishtibāh ʻan masʼalah al-miyāh / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
3. fol. 16a-22a: Risālah fīhi ajwibat baʻḍ masāʼil waqaʻat / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
4. fol. 22a-26a: Aḥkām al-faʼrah idhā waqaʻat fī al-zayt wa-naḥwih / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
5. fol. 26a-28b: Aḥkām al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-jināzah fī al-masjid / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
6. fol. 28b-33a: Fī al-tarāwiḥ wa-al-witr / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
7. fol. 33a-35b: al-Fawāʼiḍ al-jallah fī masʼalat ishtibāh al-qiblah / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
8. fol. 35b-37b: Aḥkām al-qahqahah / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
9. fol. 37b-40a: al-Aṣl fī bayān al-faṣl wa-al-waṣl / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
10. fol. 40a-45b: al-Usūs fī kayfīyat al-julūs / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
11. fol. 45b-48a: Taḥrīr al-aqwāl fī ṣawm al-sitt min Shawwāl / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
12. fol. 48a-51a: Risālah fī qaḍāʼ al-qāḍī / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
13. fol. 51a-52a: [Fatwā fī al-ʻiddah] / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
14. fol. 52a-53a: Masʼalah fī ḥaṭṭ al-thaman wa-al-ibrāʼ minhu / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
15. fol. 53a-57b: Masāʼil al-shuyūʻ / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
16. fol. 57b-63b: Aḥkām al-tazkiyah wa-al-shahādah / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
17. fol. 63b-68a: Masāʼil al-tazkiyah min al-Muntaqá / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
18. fol. 68a-74a: al-Qawl al-qāʼim fī bayān taʼthīr ḥukm al-ḥākim / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
19. fol. 74a-84a: Mā yunqaḍ min al-qaḍāʼ / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
20. fol. 84a-88a: Taḥrīr al-aqwāl fī masʼalat al-istibdāl / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
21. fol. 88a-93a: Masʼalah fī al-waqf wa-ishtirāṭ al-naẓar lil-arshad fa-al-arshad / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
22. fol. 93a-108a: Ṣūrat suʼāl / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
23. fol. 108a-114b: Fī ḥafar al-murabbaʻāt / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
24. fol. 114b-120b: Ḥukm al-khulʻ wa-ḥukm al-Ḥanbalī fīhi / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
25. fol. 120b-123a: Taʻrīf al-mustarshid fī ḥukm al-ghirās fī al-masjid / Ibn Quṭlūbughā.
extent: 123 leaves: paper ; 203 x 160 (150 x 80) mm. bound to 203 x 160 mm.
provenance: Several ownership statements on fol. 1a, including one in the name of Muṣṭafá ibn al-marḥūm al-shaykh Muḥammad Ṣādiq Efendi najal al-ʻallāmah al-humām ʻAmrī Zade al-shaykh Muḥammad Saʻdī Aq--? al-Ḥanafī al-Dimashqī, dated end of Muḥarram 1296 [Jan. 1879], with mention of price (alternate line in black and red). Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
